channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping - car tyres, 21st October
item.description:
Car tyres fly-tipped at the following w3w location:- ///gladiators.slave.cone https://w3w.co/gladiators.slave.cone

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain has been blocked for well over a year. Now causes water to enter nearing properties and frequently splashes residents and property., 21st October
item.description:
The drain opposite number 9 Northfield Terrace and the rear of 8 Clarence Sq
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Northfield Terrace, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The tree in Caernarfon close has not been looked after and park of the branches has snapped off,, 21st October
item.description:
The tree in Caernarfon close next to parking spaces as you drive in on left hand side has not been looked after and large branches have snapped off, luckily no damage to residents cars but this could happen if someone parks under, currently parking there is being avoided but the tree is next to parking spaces which are needed. Could the tree be trimmed , it is on a pavement within the close. Many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Caernarvon Close, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Low hanging brambles and hedges, 21st October
item.description:
There are low hanging brambles and hedges running along lobleys drive affecting walkers please can these be cut back asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lobleys Drive, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
